hadiths.text: It was narrated that Mansur said:"I heard Abu Wa'il (say) that Hudhaifah said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came to some people's garbage dump and urinated while standing

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الْبَوْلِ فِي الصَّحْرَاءِ قَائِمًا
chapter.eng-name: Allowing one To Urinate While Standing In A Desolate Area
